sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"相反的，对立的"之意。
means: opposite ： 指位置、方向、行动或想法等完全相反。
contrary ： 一般指与某种主张、看法或行为等正好相反，隐含否定一方并不意味着肯定另一方的意味。
adverse ： 通常指违害利益的、无生命的势力或条件等，侧重分歧。
reverse ： 指朝相反方向的或反面(背面)的。
converse ： 指在方向、行动或意见上相反的。

sentence.Network_en: Amis tells the story in reverse, from the moment the man dies.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃米斯以倒叙的方式讲述了这个故事，从这个男人死去的时候开始讲起。

sentence.Network_en: The wrong attitude will have exactly the reverse effect.
sentence.Network_cn: 错误的态度会产生完全相反的效果。

sentence.Network_en: The company had to do something to reverse its sliding fortunes.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个公司不得不采取一些措施扭转下滑的运势。

jx.jx_en_mean: (of a motor vehicle) in reverse gear so as to travel backwards

lj.lj_ly: he put the Cadillac into reverse.

jx.jx_en_mean: hold a rifle with the butt upwards, typically as a drill movement at a military or state funeral
jx.jx_cn_mean: 枪口朝下（枪把朝上，尤用作军葬或国葬的操枪动作）

jx.jx_en_mean: (chiefly Brit.)make the recipient of a telephone call responsible for payment
To turn and proceed in the opposite direction.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French revers, reverse (nouns), reverser (verb), from Latin reversus 'turned back', past participle of revertere, from re- 'back' + vertere 'to turn'

entry.tran: 逆转，彻底改变（决定、政策、趋势等）
entry.def: When someone or something reverses a decision, policy, or trend, they change it to the opposite decision, policy, or trend.

example.ex: They have made it clear they will not reverse the decision to increase prices...
example.tran: 他们已经明确表示不会更改提价的决定。

example.ex: The rise, the first in 10 months, reversed the downward trend in Belgium's jobless rate.
example.tran: 10个月来失业率的首次上升逆转了比利时失业率持续下降的趋势。

entry.def: If you reverse the order of a set of things, you arrange them in the opposite order, so that the first thing comes last.

example.ex: In the squares place a penny, nickel, dime and quarter in that order. The object is to reverse the order of these coins...
example.tran: 在这些方块中按顺序放置1分、5分、10分和25分的硬币各一枚。目标是颠倒这些硬币的顺序。

example.ex: The normal word order is reversed in passive sentences.
example.tran: 正常词序在被动句中是颠倒的。

entry.def: If you reverse the positions or functions of two things, you change them so that each thing has the position or function that the other one had.

example.ex: He reversed the position of the two stamps.
example.tran: 他将两枚邮票的位置调换了一下。

entry.def: When a car reverses or when you reverse it, the car is driven backwards.

example.ex: Another car reversed out of the drive...

entry.def: If your car is in reverse, you have changed gear so that you can drive it backwards.

example.ex: He lurched the car in reverse along the ruts to the access road.
example.tran: 他顺着车辙摇摇晃晃地将车倒到了支路上。

entry.def: Reverse means opposite to what you expect or to what has just been described.

example.ex: The wrong attitude will have exactly the reverse effect.
example.tran: 错误的态度会产生完全相反的效果。

entry.def: If you say that one thing is the reverse of another, you are emphasizing that the first thing is the complete opposite of the second thing.

example.ex: There is absolutely no evidence at all that spectators want longer cricket matches. Quite the reverse...
example.tran: 完全没有证据表明观众想看时间更长的板球比赛。情况恰恰相反。

example.ex: This would lead one to expect a fat, dense and detailed autobiography. The reverse is true. The book is short and spare.
example.tran: 这会让人以为是一本内容晦涩而详尽的大部头自传。但正好相反，这本书简短明了。

entry.def: A reverse is a serious failure or defeat.

example.ex: It's clear that the party of the former Prime Minister has suffered a major reverse.
example.tran: 显然，前首相所在党派遭受了重大的挫折。

entry.def: The reverse or the reverse side of a flat object which has two sides is the less important or the other side.

example.ex: Cheques should be made payable to Country Living and your address written on the reverse.
example.tran: 支票抬头必须写“《乡村生活》杂志”，你的地址应写在背面。

entry.def: If something happens in reverse or goes into reverse, things happen in the opposite way to what usually happens or to what has been happening.

example.ex: Amis tells the story in reverse, from the moment the man dies...
example.tran: 埃米斯以倒叙的方式讲述了这个故事，从这个男人死去的时候开始讲起。

example.ex: The downward trend went into reverse and the scores started to creep up again.
example.tran: 比分下降的趋势发生逆转，分数又开始逐渐上升了。

entry.def: If you reverse the charges when you make a telephone call, the person who you are phoning pays the cost of the call and not you.

sentences.sentence: "we thought Sue was older than Bill but just the reverse was true"

means.word_mean: 2. the gears by which the motion of a machine can be reversed
3. an unfortunate happening that hinders of impedes; something that is thwarting or frustrating
4. the side of a coin or medal that does not bear the principal design
5. (American football) a running play in which a back running in one direction hands the ball to a back running in the opposite direction

sentences.sentence: "public opinion turned when it was revealed that the president had an affair with a White House intern"

means.word_mean: 2. turn inside out or upside down

sentences.sentence: "The Republicans were overruled when the House voted on the bill"

means.word_mean: 1. directed or moving toward the rear;
2. reversed (turned backward) in order or nature or effect
3. of the transmission gear causing backward movement in a motor vehicle;

Sentence.sentence: As our special report in this issue (printed before Mr Jobs's death) explains, innovation used to spill over from military and corporate laboratories to the consumer market, but lately this process has gone into reverse.
Those who are thinking their time did reverse spending time socializing instead of working.
In wealthy societies, the logic often reverses.
Now the question must be reversed.

sentences.en: Please reverse the positions of two pictures.
sentences.cn: 请把两张图片的位置倒转过来。
他们现在的位置颠倒了。

sentences.en: The appeal court reversed the original verdict and set the prisoner free.
sentences.cn: 上诉法庭撤销了原判, 把那个犯人释放了。

sentences.en: The car was reversed through the gate.

means.word_mean: 相反的, 颠倒的, 反向的

sentences.en: Please read the names on this list in reverse order.
sentences.cn: 请看看这张单子上的名字, 先从末尾看起。

sentences.en: Please write down your name on the reverse side of the envelope.
sentences.cn: 请在信封的背面写下你的名字。

sentences.en: His answer was just the reverse of what I expected.
sentences.cn: 他的回答正好与我期望的相反。

sentences.en: The coin has a crowned lion on its reverse.
sentences.cn: 这枚硬币反面的图案是个戴皇冠的狮子。

sentences.en: After the war the government reversed its foreign policy.
sentences.cn: 政府在战后彻底改变了它的外交政策。

jushi.chinese: 他们现在的位置颠倒了。
